member.name: T:FtpAdapters.FtpReader
member.summary: Defines an adapter that downloads FTP files.

member.name: P:FtpAdapters.FtpReader.Host
member.summary: Gets or sets FTP host name.

member.name: P:FtpAdapters.FtpReader.UserName
member.summary: Gets or sets FTP user name.

member.name: P:FtpAdapters.FtpReader.RemotePath
member.summary: Gets or sets remote FTP path.

member.name: P:FtpAdapters.FtpReader.RemoteFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets remote FTP file name.

member.name: P:FtpAdapters.FtpReader.LocalFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets local file name.

member.name: P:FtpAdapters.FtpReader.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.name: M:FtpAdapters.FtpReader.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:FtpAdapters.FtpReader.GetShortStatus(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a short one-line status of this .
member.param: Maximum number of available characters for display.
member.returns: A short one-line summary of the current status of this .

member.name: M:FtpAdapters.FtpReader.DownloadFile
member.summary: Connects to FTP host and downloads file.
